 33namespace vsip

 36namespace impl

 39namespace edl_details

 41
 42/// Implementation tags for Ext_data local
 43
 44struct Impl_use_direct; // Use Ext_data directly on block.
 45struct Impl_use_local;  // Use Ext_data on get_local_block of block
 46struct Impl_remap;      // Use Ext_data on reorganized block.
 47
 48
 49
 50/// Choose Ext_data_dist implementation tag for a block.
 51
 52/// Requires:
 53///   BLOCKT is a block type to use direct access on,
 54///   LP     is the requested layout policy.
 55
 56template <typename BlockT,
 57	  typename LP>
 58struct Choose_impl_tag
 59{
 60  static dimension_type const dim = LP::dim;
 61  typedef typename BlockT::value_type                value_type;
 62  typedef typename BlockT::map_type                  map_type;
 63  typedef typename Block_layout<BlockT>::layout_type actual_LP;
 64
 65  static bool const local_equiv =
 66	Is_layout_compatible<value_type, LP, actual_LP>::value &&
 67        Type_equal<Global_map<dim>, map_type>::value;
 68
 69  static bool const equiv = local_equiv &&
 70	Adjust_type<Local_map, map_type>::equiv;
 71
 72  static bool const is_local = Type_equal<Local_map, map_type>::value;
 73
 74  typedef typename
 75    ITE_Type<is_local,    As_type<Impl_use_direct>,
 76    ITE_Type<local_equiv, As_type<Impl_use_local>,
 77		          As_type<Impl_remap> > >
 78    ::type type;
 79};
 80
 81} // namespace vsip::impl::edl_details
 82
 83
 84
 85/// High-level data access class, reorganizes distributed data to
 86/// a single local copy.  Provides data access to data stored in
 87/// blocks, using an appropriate low-level data interface.
 88
 89/// Requires:
 90///   BLOCK is a block type.
 91///   LP is the desired layout policy for the data access.
 92///   RP is a reference counting policy.
 93///   AT is a data access tag that selects the low-level interface
 94///      used to access the data.  By default, Choose_access is used to
 95///      select the appropriate access tag for a given block type
 96///      BLOCK and layout LP. [2]
 97///   IMPLTAG is a tag to choose how block needs to be reorganized,
 98///      if at all.
 99///
100/// Notes:
101/// [1] Selecting a specific low-level interface is discouraged.
102///     Selecting one that is not compatible with BLOCK will result in
103///     undefined behavior.
104///
105/// [2] Choose_access is not used for the default template parameter,
106///     because the block type may change before access is done, esp
107///     when ImplTag = remap.  Instead, "Default_access_type" is used
108///     to indicate that Choose_access should be used once the block
109///     type is known.
110
111template <typename Block,
112	  sync_action_type SP,
113	  typename LP      = typename Desired_block_layout<Block>::layout_type,
114	  typename RP      = No_count_policy,
115	  typename AT      = Default_access_tag,
116	  typename ImplTag = typename 
117                             edl_details::Choose_impl_tag<Block, LP>::type>
118class Ext_data_dist;
119
120
121
122/// Helper class for Impl_use_direct variant of Ext_data_dist to determine
123/// base class to derive from.
124
125template <typename BlockT,
126	  typename LP,
127	  typename RP,
128	  typename AT>
129struct Use_direct_helper
130{
131  typedef typename
132          ITE_Type<Type_equal<AT, Default_access_tag>::value,
133                   Choose_access<BlockT, LP>, As_type<AT> >::type
134          access_type;
135  typedef Ext_data<BlockT, LP, RP, access_type> base_type;
136};
137
138
139
140/// Ext_data_dist variant to directly use Ext_data for access to block.
141
142template <typename BlockT,
143	  sync_action_type SP,
144	  typename LP,
145	  typename RP,
146	  typename AT>
147class Ext_data_dist<BlockT, SP, LP, RP, AT, edl_details::Impl_use_direct>
148  : public Use_direct_helper<BlockT, LP, RP, AT>::base_type
149{
150  typedef typename Non_const_of<BlockT>::type non_const_block_type;
151  typedef typename Use_direct_helper<BlockT, LP, RP, AT>::base_type base_type;
152
153  typedef typename base_type::storage_type storage_type;
154  typedef typename base_type::raw_ptr_type raw_ptr_type;
155
156  // Constructor and destructor.
157public:
158  Ext_data_dist(non_const_block_type& block,
159		raw_ptr_type          buffer = raw_ptr_type())
160    : base_type(block, SP, buffer)
161  {}
162
163  Ext_data_dist(BlockT const&      block,
164		raw_ptr_type       buffer = raw_ptr_type())
165    : base_type(block, SP, buffer)
166  {}
167
168  ~Ext_data_dist() {}
169};
170
171
172
173/// Helper class for Impl_use_local variant of Ext_data_dist to determine
174/// base class to derive from.
175
176template <typename BlockT,
177	  typename LP,
178	  typename RP,
179	  typename AT>
180struct Use_local_helper
181{
182  typedef typename Distributed_local_block<BlockT>::type local_block_type;
183  typedef typename
184          ITE_Type<Type_equal<AT, Default_access_tag>::value,
185                   Choose_access<local_block_type, LP>, As_type<AT> >::type
186          access_type;
187  typedef Ext_data<local_block_type, LP, RP, access_type> base_type;
188};
189
190
191
192/// Ext_data_dist variant to use Ext_data access on a distributed block's
193/// local block (as returned by get_local_block).
194
195template <typename         BlockT,
196	  sync_action_type SP,
197	  typename         LP,
198	  typename         RP,
199	  typename         AT>
200class Ext_data_dist<BlockT, SP, LP, RP, AT, edl_details::Impl_use_local>
201  : public Use_local_helper<BlockT, LP, RP, AT>::base_type
202{
203  typedef typename Non_const_of<BlockT>::type non_const_block_type;
204  typedef typename Distributed_local_block<BlockT>::type local_block_type;
205  typedef typename Use_local_helper<BlockT, LP, RP, AT>::base_type base_type;
206
207  typedef typename base_type::storage_type storage_type;
208  typedef typename base_type::raw_ptr_type raw_ptr_type;
209
210  // Constructor and destructor.
211public:
212  Ext_data_dist(non_const_block_type& block,
213		raw_ptr_type          buffer = raw_ptr_type())
214    : base_type(get_local_block(block), SP, buffer)
215  {}
216
217  Ext_data_dist(BlockT const&      block,
218		raw_ptr_type       buffer = raw_ptr_type())
219    : base_type(get_local_block(block), SP, buffer)
220  {}
221
222  ~Ext_data_dist() {}
223};
224
225
226
227/// Ext_data_dist variant to use Ext_data access on a reorganized
228/// copy of the original distributed block.
229
230template <typename         BlockT,
231	  sync_action_type SP,
232	  typename         LP,
233	  typename         RP,
234	  typename         AT>
235class Ext_data_dist<BlockT, SP, LP, RP, AT, edl_details::Impl_remap>
236{
237  typedef typename Non_const_of<BlockT>::type non_const_block_type;
238  static dimension_type const dim = BlockT::dim;
239  typedef typename BlockT::value_type value_type;
240  typedef Us_block<dim, value_type, LP, Local_map> block_type;
241  typedef typename View_of_dim<dim, value_type, block_type>::type view_type;
242
243  typedef typename View_of_dim<dim, value_type, BlockT>::type src_view_type;
244
245  typedef typename
246          ITE_Type<Type_equal<AT, Default_access_tag>::value,
247                   Choose_access<block_type, LP>, As_type<AT> >::type
248          access_type;
249  typedef Persistent_ext_data<block_type, LP, RP, access_type> ext_type;
250
251  typedef Allocated_storage<typename LP::complex_type,
252			    typename BlockT::value_type> storage_type;
253  typedef typename ext_type::raw_ptr_type raw_ptr_type;
254
255  // Constructor and destructor.
256public:
257  Ext_data_dist(non_const_block_type& block,
258		raw_ptr_type          buffer = raw_ptr_type())
259    : src_     (block),
260      storage_ (block.size(), buffer),
261      block_   (block_domain<dim>(block), storage_.data()),
262      view_    (block_),
263      ext_     (block_, SP)
264  {
265    assign_local(view_, src_);
266    ext_.begin();
267  }
268
269  Ext_data_dist(BlockT const&      block,
270		raw_ptr_type       buffer = raw_ptr_type())
271    : src_     (const_cast<BlockT&>(block)),
272      storage_ (block.size(), buffer),
273      block_   (block_domain<dim>(block), storage_.data()),
274      view_    (block_),
275      ext_     (block_, SP)
276  {
277    assert(SP != SYNC_OUT && SP != SYNC_INOUT);
278    assign_local(view_, src_);
279    ext_.begin();
280  }
281
282  ~Ext_data_dist()
283  {
284    ext_.end();
285    assign_local_if<SP & SYNC_OUT>(src_, view_);
286    storage_.deallocate(block_.size());
287  }
288
289
290  // Direct data acessors.
291public:
292  raw_ptr_type	data  ()                 { return ext_.data  ();  }
293  stride_type	stride(dimension_type d) { return ext_.stride(d); }
294  length_type	size  (dimension_type d) { return ext_.size  (d); }
295
296  // Copy to temp buffer view_/block_ forces cost = 2.
297  int           cost  ()                 { return 2; }
298
299private:
300  src_view_type    src_;	// view of source block
301  storage_type     storage_;	// buffer
302  block_type       block_;	// Us_block referring to storage_ buffer.
303  view_type        view_;
304  ext_type         ext_;
305};
306
307
308
309} // namespace vsip::impl
310} // namespace vsip
